text:
Death of a Nation: Can We Save America a Second Time? is a 2018 American political documentary film by American conservative political commentator Dinesh D'Souza. In the documentary, D'Souza compares the political climate surrounding the 45th President of the United States Donald Trump to that of the 16th President, Abraham Lincoln. The film indicates that the Democratic Party from both eras was critical of both Presidents and analyzes the Democrats' alleged similarities to fascist regimes, including the Nazi Party. The film was written and directed by Dinesh D'Souza and Bruce Schooley, and produced by Gerald R. Molen.
Death of a Nation was released in the United States on August 3, 2018 and grossed $5.9 million against its $6 million budget. The New York Times reported that the film was "...roasted [criticized] by actual historians and film critics, who point to the many misrepresentations and falsehoods littered throughout".
